title: Talking About Your Work or Studies

content.text: Let's learn how to talk about your job or studies. Imagine you're at a party and someone asks what you do.

data.phrase: Qu'est-ce que tu fais dans la vie ?
data.meaning: What do you do for a living?

content.text: To state your profession, use `Je suis` + your job. Unlike in English, you don't need 'a' or 'an'. For example: `Je suis programmeur`.

data.tip: The final 'ail' combination sounds like the English word 'eye'.

content.title: Stating Your Profession
content.setting: You are at a party and meet Chloé. She asks you what you do.

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Salut ! Qu'est-ce que tu fais dans la vie ?
conversation_flow.title: State your job or what you study

extract_info.user_profession: Extract the user's profession or field of study

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Intéressant ! Tu travailles pour une entreprise ou tu es à l'université ?
conversation_flow.title: Mention your company or university

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Et tu aimes ton travail ?
conversation_flow.title: Say that you like your job or studies

content.text: Great! Now let's add some more details, like what you do and for how long you've been doing it.
You can use `Je travaille` with `à plein temps` or `à mi-temps` to describe your work hours.

data.tip: This is a nasal vowel sound. It's similar to the 'an' in the English word 'bank', but made with your lips more spread.

content.title: Describing Your Work
content.setting: The conversation with Chloé continues. She wants to know more.

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Super ! Et qu'est-ce que tu fais exactement ?
conversation_flow.title: Describe one main task you do

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Tu travailles à plein temps ?
conversation_flow.title: State if you work full-time or part-time

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Et tu travailles là depuis longtemps ?
conversation_flow.title: Say how long you have been there

content.text: Excellent! Now it's your turn to ask the questions. Use `Et toi ?` to easily return a question.

data.tip: The 'è' has an open sound, like the 'e' in the English word 'bed'.

content.title: Asking About Their Work
content.setting: You've talked about yourself. Now, find out about Chloé's job.

conversation_flow.title: Ask what she does for work

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: {user_profession}, c'est intéressant ! Moi, je suis photographe.
conversation_flow.title: Ask if she has nice colleagues

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, mes collègues sont très sympas.
conversation_flow.title: Make a positive comment about her job
